original_text: And the children of Israel did so, and put them out without the camp: as the Lord spake unto Moses, so did the children of Israel.
korean_text: 이스라엘 자손이 그같이 행하여 그들을 진영 밖으로 내보냈으니 곧 여호와께서 모세에게 이르신 대로 이스라엘 자손이 행하였더라

sentences.original_text: And the children of Israel did so
and put them out without the camp
as the Lord spake unto Moses
so did the children of Israel
